data.name: TIME FOR YOU - CHAPTER 02 - DIRTY THOUGHTS AND CORPORATE BOTS
data.detailed_description:
The continuation of Time For You!

With David still in the hospital, someone needed to take care of his company, ETMI Corp. This left it up to Selena, one of your oldest friends. With all that had been going on, you haven’t seen Selena in the house, and it’s already been a couple of days since she's been home. Selena is presumably at the company working, but why has she not returned? You travel to ETMI Corp to discover that things are not as they seem. Something strange is going on with the people working at ETMI Corp, and you can’t leave till you find out what’s going on, and more importantly, where Selena is. What secrets do ETMI Corp and Selena hold? They might be more devious than you think.

data.short_description: The continuation of Time For You! There's something strange going on at ETMI Corp. Selena has been gone for too long and her coworkers are anything but normal. Find Selena, figure out what's going on, and get home. Should be easy, right?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 216 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 216 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 216 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. There is explicit sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious and all characters are 18 and over.

Contains nudity, mature language, vaginal and non-penetrative sexual acts.
